en: Type "help" to display this message again.
zh-cn: 输入“help”以再次显示此消息。

en: Type "hint" if you get REALLY stuck.
zh-cn: 如果你真的被卡住了，请输入“hint”。

en: What is the answer to this challenge?
zh-cn: 这个挑战的答案是什么？

en: Now press the A button to verify your answer
zh-cn: 现在按“A”按钮验证您的答案

en: When you think you know the answer, type "answer" and press ENTER
zh-cn: 如果您认为自己知道答案，请输入“answer”并按 ENTER 键

en: If you need a hint, maybe you should try an EASIER difficulty :)
zh-cn: 如果您需要提示，也许您应该尝试一个较低的难度 :)

en: You haven't answered yet! You must run the "answer" command and press ENTER
zh-cn: 您尚未作答！ 您必须运行“answer”命令并按 Enter 键

en: Your answer is incorrect! Type "hint" if you are stuck.
zh-cn: 您答错了！如果您实在卡住了，可以输入“hint”。

en: To exit the game press Ctrl+Alt+Del
zh-cn: 要退出游戏，请按Ctrl + Alt + Del
